0: Newt Gingrich got visibly worked up in response to a question about the Occupy Wall Street protests. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR He attacked the idea that Wall Street bankers should go to jail for the economic crisis, calling out D.C. regulators – including former Connecticut Sen. Chris Dodd and Massachusetts Rep. Barney Frank by name. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR “If you want to put people in jail, you ought to start with Barney Frank and Chris Dodd,” he said, pointing to Dodd’s cozy relationship with the lender Countrywide and Frank’s relationship with Fannie Mae lobbyists. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR And that’s when he really his stride.
